home.news_c: Deliver the latest brand information and news, such as event information and new product information
home.portfolio_c: In the world carefully selected high quality, good reputation, is committed to creating a first-class brand in the Chinese market

about.title: ABOUT US
about.card_fir_text: China Wines & Spirits (CWS) is a subsidiary of the ELAN Group. The ELAN Group is based in Bordeaux, France, and operates in 4 countries. It has 20 years of experience in the distribution of fine wines and spirits. Through a centralized sourcing, logistics and purchasing center, the ELAN Group distributes over 400 brands from 22 countries throughout Eurasia, with very strong market shares in the countries it operates in. It serves more than 4,000 customers, with over 2.5 million bottles sold.
about.card_sed_text: CWS was created in 2006, and has built a very wide and strong network of customers across China in the On Trade, Wholesale, Digital, Private and Corporate channels throughout the years. With 5 offices and warehouses, CWS can ensure a very responsive, flexible and professional service for all its customers. Thanks to its presence in Shanghai, Beijing, Chengdu, Guangzhou and Shenzhen, CWS covers most of the first and second tier cities in China.
about.card_trd_text: With a portfolio that includes over 150 wine and spirit brands and over 1,000 products, CWS has one of the most complete assortments of wines in Mainland China. From the most prestigious estates in the world to some hidden and carefully selected gems, CWS boasts products for all types of demands and channels. With products from France, Italy, Spain, Portugal, England, Scotland, Ireland, Germany, China, Chile, Argentina, USA, New Zealand, South Africa, Brazil and Cuba, to name some, CWS covers most of the wine and spirit producing countries in the world.

service.title: OUR SERVICES
service.title_c: China Wines & Spirits (CWS) strives to offer to all of its customers the very best service, from logistics to sales and marketing support.
service.card_fir_title: From the cellar to your glass
service.card_fir_text: We source our products directly from our partner wineries and distilleries to ensure that we offer our customers products straight out of the cellars. Our locally implanted and temperature controlled warehouses allow CWS to deliver to its customers quickly and efficiently under optimal conditions.
service.card_sed_text: Through its experienced, professional and above all passionate sales team, CWS ensures its customers a dedicated follow up through competitive offers and bespoke services.
service.card_trd_text: CWS organizes wine related marketing events to support its customers many times per year (>80 a year), as well as mixology events (>100 a year) and several other tailor made services (menu design, wine and cocktail list creation, sommelier service, etc). CWS also organizes successful China-wide events, such as mixology contests or portfolio tastings.
